Articles.Content:
Hi guys, this is something I did today for loading an SSTO without having to respawn it with the payload attached. This way, I have to fit and attach the payload to the SSTO by myself.

The crane uses KW, B9, KAS, and IR mods. It has a movable telescopic arm with an attached winch with an electromagnet to lift any payload to the cargo bay. Inside the cargo bay there's another winch that's used to secure the payload to the bay. In the front there's also a KAS container box to store different parts if necessary.
